about_the_game:
Dive into the world of the Zindi Kingdom in this demo of Xavian. Step into the paws of Xavian, the magically gifted lion, or Hathor, the enigmatic "Goddess of Chaos," as you explore a portion of the Magic City and its surroundings.

What’s included in this demo:

  • Playable Characters: Experience unique gameplay mechanics for both Xavian and Hathor, each with distinct spells and abilities.

  • Combat Trial: Test your skills in the Virtual Reality dimension showcasing dynamic magical combat and character progression.

  • Rail Grinding: Compete in the Rail Grinding Trail in the "Battle Arena," and finish before time expires.

  • Exploration: Navigate a semi-open environment with platforming challenges, hidden collectibles, and environmental storytelling.

  • Upgradable Abilities: Unlock and enhance a selection of spells and abilities tailored to each character’s strengths.

This demo offers a sneak peek into the combat, exploration, and character mechanics that define the full game. Can you take the first steps toward becoming a Solar Guardian?
